thread.title: Reacher season 3 on Prime Video cancelled? Here is what we know so far
thread.title_full: Reacher season 3 on Prime Video cancelled? Here is what we know so far

author: VNExplorer
title: Reacher season 3 on Prime Video cancelled? Here is what we know so far
text: 'Reacher' season 3 release date has a new but big update. Paramount Global is shutting down Paramount Television Studios as part of its strategy. Reacher fans are now curious about the future of the show. However, in a good news 'Reacher' season 3 will not be scrapped. It will go on as per schedule. CBS Studios will manage 'Reacher' season 3, according to a report on Collider. 'Reacher' season 3 is happening, as of now, even though there will be new management to oversee the project. 'Reacher' Season 3 is scheduled to be released on Prime Video in 2025. Paramount Global stated it would begin laying off 15 per cent of its workforce in the United States as part of its planned job cuts, the media giant said in an internal memo. Paramount, which owns networks like CBS, MTV and Comedy Central, aims to reduce annual costs by $500 million and return to profitable growth ahead of its merger with David Ellison's Skydance Media. In an internal memo, Paramount's co-CEOs stated that the company is at an "inflection point" where changes are necessary to strengthen the business. FAQs Q1. When will Reacher Season 3 release?A1. 'Reacher' Season 3 is scheduled to be released in 2025. Q2. Where can we watch Reacher Season 3?A2. 'Reacher' Season 3 can be watched on Prime Video. For more news like this visit The Economic Times.
